programme.title: Four Sisters Before the Wedding
programme.desc: When their parents' marriage threatens to crumble, the teenage Salazar siblings plot to reconcile them before their 20th wedding anniversary.

programme.title: Can't Buy Me Love
programme.desc: The third daughter, Princess Chiu Yeung, of the Tang Emperor, is known throughout the kingdom for her beauty, but she is also known for her unreasonable and stubborn personality. For this reason, no one wants to marry her - that is, until the second son of the formerly wealthy Kam family, Kam Dor Luk, is persuaded to marry her to save the family business.

It's Showtime
programme.desc: "It's Showtime" is a hit variety program that thrives on spontaneity and animated conversations.

programme.title: Tiktoclock: Happy Hour Na
programme.desc: A game-variety show showcasing talents of Filipinos in singing, dancing and many more.

programme.title: Binibining Marikit
programme.desc: This is the story of Marikit, or Ikit, a hardworking and cheerful Dumagat Remontado tour guide. Raised by her father Gani after being abandoned by her mother Mayumi, Ikit grows up believing that her mother left them for ambition. Their lives take a turn when Rica, a widow, and her daughter Angela arrive in Daraitan, scheming to buy Dumagat lands for a development project.

programme.title: Mommy Dearest
programme.desc: It tells the story of a woman whose love for and obsession with her daughter borders on harmful and toxic behavior.

programme.title: Prinsesa ng City Jail
programme.desc: The story will follow Princess, who grows up inside the city jail along with jail guards. While searching for her real family, she will be helped by a new inmate, Xavier.

programme.title: Mga Batang Riles
programme.desc: It tells the story of four underprivileged boys -- Kidlat, Kulot, Sig, and Dags -- who were detained in a juvenile center as a punishment for a crime they did not commit. In the juvenile center, they must fight the odds, survive, and get out to find the real culprit, clear their names, and save their impoverished neighborhood from corruption and abuse.

programme.title: Slay: 'Til Death Do Us Part
programme.desc: The story follows four women--Sugar (Mikee Quintos), Liv (Julie Anne San Jose), Amelie (Gabbi Garcia), and Yana (Ysabel Ortega), each with their own motive to kill fitness influencer, Zach (Derrick Monasterio). programme.desc: It features two families who compete to name the most popular answers to survey questions in order to win cash and prizes.

programme.title: Binibining Marikit
programme.desc: This is the story of Marikit, or Ikit, a hardworking and cheerful Dumagat Remontado tour guide. Raised by her father Gani after being abandoned by her mother Mayumi, Ikit grows up believing that her mother left them for ambition. Their lives take a turn when Rica, a widow, and her daughter Angela arrive in Daraitan, scheming to buy Dumagat lands for a development project.

programme.title: Mommy Dearest
programme.desc: It tells the story of a woman whose love for and obsession with her daughter borders on harmful and toxic behavior.

programme.title: Prinsesa ng City Jail
programme.desc: The story will follow Princess, who grows up inside the city jail along with jail guards. While searching for her real family, she will be helped by a new inmate, Xavier.

programme.title: Mga Batang Riles
programme.desc: It tells the story of four underprivileged boys -- Kidlat, Kulot, Sig, and Dags -- who were detained in a juvenile center as a punishment for a crime they did not commit. In the juvenile center, they must fight the odds, survive, and get out to find the real culprit, clear their names, and save their impoverished neighborhood from corruption and abuse.

programme.title: Slay: 'Til Death Do Us Part
programme.desc: The story follows four women--Sugar (Mikee Quintos), Liv (Julie Anne San Jose), Amelie (Gabbi Garcia), and Yana (Ysabel Ortega), each with their own motive to kill fitness influencer, Zach (Derrick Monasterio). When Zach dies in a gym fire, the women find themselves entangled in a deadly web of secrets.Juro (Royce Cabrera), an investigator, digs deeper and his relentless pursuit threatens to uncov

programme.title: Family Feud
programme.desc: It features two families who compete to name the most popular answers to survey questions in order to win cash and prizes.

programme.title: Four Sisters Before the Wedding
programme.desc: When their parents' marriage threatens to crumble, the teenage Salazar siblings plot to reconcile them before their 20th wedding anniversary.

programme.title: Can't Buy Me Love
programme.desc: The third daughter, Princess Chiu Yeung, of the Tang Emperor, is known throughout the kingdom for her beauty, but she is also known for her unreasonable and stubborn personality. For this reason, no one wants to marry her - that is, until the second son of the formerly wealthy Kam family, Kam Dor Luk, is persuaded to marry her to save the family business.

programme.title: Pinoy Big Brother Celebrity Edition Collab
Pinoy Big Brother Celebrity Edition Collab
Ghost Adventures S1 ep 8
programme.desc: A clairvoyant repairman fearful of ghosts is forced to help them cross over so they can leave him in peace. On his journey of helping these ghosts with their unfinished businesses, he ends up getting into trouble with their families, friends and the community they are all living in. Will he be able to get these ghosts and their love ones, at the same time face his fear of them?

programme.title: Taddy Taddy Po ep 9
programme.desc: A Sari-Sari Original Series. In this modern family, love wins. Alex is an up-and-coming reporter in a relationship with Marcus, a chef. One day, Alex's sister's kids show up at the couple's doorstep and the couple has no choice but to take care of the kids.

programme.title: Minsan Pa Natin Hagkan ang Nakaraan ep 6
programme.desc: A woman who was severely broken by her greatest love finds love again in an older man who did everything to put her back together. Just when she thought her life is finally back to normal, her greatest love comes back, determined to work for her forgiveness and win her backeven if it means breaking her family apart.

programme.title: Totoy Bato ep 21
programme.desc: Totoy Bato explores the origins, the pathos of the character Totoy. All the different battle he went through (terrorist, revenge for his wife, corruption, prejudice and for love) defines him as a character.

programme.title: Blue Jeans ep 4
programme.desc: BLUE JEANS is a youth-oriented drama that follows the intersecting and intertwining lives of 6 present-day Filipino working students in the university belt.

programme.title: Da Pers Family ep 3
programme.desc:
A story of a couple who preserves the family 
bakery business legacy from closure. Now the 
couples children, volunteers to step in and help the 
business. Are the parents willing to accept change 
and innovations of the new generation?

programme.title: Encounter ep 16
programme.desc: A story of two strangers meeting at the most unlikely place and sharing an important moment, not knowing that they will be soon be brought togetheragain by fatte, fall in love, and challenged by the very different worlds they live in.

programme.title: Destiny Guard ep 10
programme.desc: Angels of destiny work as security guards, matching people with their soul mates and making sure they end up together. But what if a female guard falls in love with a man under her watch?

programme.title: Totoy Bato ep 22
programme.desc: Totoy Bato explores the origins, the pathos of the character Totoy. All the different battle he went through (terrorist, revenge for his wife, corruption, prejudice and for love) defines him as a character.

programme.title: Minsan Pa Natin Hagkan ang Nakaraan ep 7
programme.desc: A woman who was severely broken by her greatest love finds love again in an older man who did everything to put her back together. programme.title: Encounter ep 17
programme.desc: A story of two strangers meeting at the most unlikely place and sharing an important moment, not knowing that they will be soon be brought togetheragain by fatte, fall in love, and challenged by the very different worlds they live in.

programme.title: The Mysterious Case of Ana Madrigal ep 5
programme.desc: Christine, an up and coming investigative journalist (Maui Taylor) is hot on the trail of a cold case for her new television show. This cold case is close to her heart because the victim happens to be her estranged half sister, Ana Madrigal. Together with her TV crew, Christine attempts to uncover the truth behind what really happened on the night of her sister's death - even if it kills her.

programme.title: Minsan Pa Natin Hagkan ang Nakaraan ep 7
programme.desc: A woman who was severely broken by her greatest love finds love again in an older man who did everything to put her back together. Just when she thought her life is finally back to normal, her greatest love comes back, determined to work for her forgiveness and win her backeven if it means breaking her family apart.

programme.title: Totoy Bato ep 22
programme.desc: Totoy Bato explores the origins, the pathos of the character Totoy. All the different battle he went through (terrorist, revenge for his wife, corruption, prejudice and for love) defines him as a character.

programme.title: The Rain in Espaa ep 3
programme.desc: The Rain in Espaa follows the story of Kalix, a student hailing from a family of doctors who decided to tread a different path and take up Legal Management at Ateneo de Manila University. During his stay there, he crosses paths with Luna, an Architecture student from the University of Santo Tomas.

programme.title: Encounter ep 17
programme.desc: A story of two strangers meeting at the most unlikely place and sharing an important moment, not knowing that they will be soon be brought togetheragain by fatte, fall in love, and challenged by the very different worlds they live in.

programme.title: Minsan Pa Natin Hagkan ang Nakaraan ep 7
programme.desc: A woman who was severely broken by her greatest love finds love again in an older man who did everything to put her back together. Just when she thought her life is finally back to normal, her greatest love comes back, determined to work for her forgiveness and win her backeven if it means breaking her family apart.

programme.title: Totoy Bato ep 22
programme.desc: Totoy Bato explores the origins, the pathos of the character Totoy. All the different battle he went through (terrorist, revenge for his wife, corruption, prejudice and for love) defines him as a character.

programme.title: Da Pers Family ep 3
programme.desc:
A story of a couple who preserves the family 
bakery business legacy from closure. Now the 
couples children, volunteers to step in and help the 
business. Are the parents willing to accept change 
and innovations of the new generation?

programme.title: The Rain in Espaa ep 3
programme.desc: The Rain in Espaa follows the story of Kalix, a student hailing from a family of doctors who decided to tread a different path and take up Legal Management at Ateneo de Manila University. During his stay there, he crosses paths with Luna, an Architecture student from the University of Santo Tomas.

programme.title: The Kasambahays S2 ep 15
programme.desc: Guia (Donnalyn Bartolome) transfers to a different neighborhood, meets new faces. New kasambahays, new masters and a whole new adventure packed with fun and laughter.

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S1 ep 8
programme.desc: A clairvoyant repairman fearful of ghosts is forced to help them cross over so they can leave him in peace. On his journey of helping these ghosts with their unfinished businesses, he ends up getting into trouble with their families, friends and the community they are all living in. Will he be able to get these ghosts and their love ones, at the same time face his fear of them?

programme.title: Minsan Pa Natin Hagkan ang Nakaraan ep 7
programme.desc: A woman who was severely broken by her greatest love finds love again in an older man who did everything to put her back together. Just when she thought her life is finally back to normal, her greatest love comes back, determined to work for her forgiveness and win her backeven if it means breaking her family apart.

business. Are the parents willing to accept change 
and innovations of the new generation?

programme.title: Destiny Guard ep 10
programme.desc: Angels of destiny work as security guards, matching people with their soul mates and making sure they end up together. But what if a female guard falls in love with a man under her watch?

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S1 ep 8
programme.desc: A clairvoyant repairman fearful of ghosts is forced to help them cross over so they can leave him in peace. On his journey of helping these ghosts with their unfinished businesses, he ends up getting into trouble with their families, friends and the community they are all living in. Will he be able to get these ghosts and their love ones, at the same time face his fear of them?

programme.title: Taddy Taddy Po ep 10
programme.desc: A Sari-Sari Original Series. In this modern family, love wins. Alex is an up-and-coming reporter in a relationship with Marcus, a chef. One day, Alex's sister's kids show up at the couple's doorstep and the couple has no choice but to take care of the kids.

programme.title: Totoy Bato ep 23
programme.desc: Totoy Bato explores the origins, the pathos of the character Totoy. All the different battle he went through (terrorist, revenge for his wife, corruption, prejudice and for love) defines him as a character.

Just when she thought her life is finally back to normal, her greatest love comes back, determined to work for her forgiveness and win her backeven if it means breaking her family apart.

programme.title: Kalye Kweens ep 11
programme.desc:
Mandy and Telly are former best friends who are now the leaders of 
neighboring communities that have been perennially in conflict. Their 
game of one-upmanship worsens when both their sons become best 
friends but are smitten with the same girl.

programme.title: Destiny Guard ep 10
programme.desc: Angels of destiny work as security guards, matching people with their soul mates and making sure they end up together. But what if a female guard falls in love with a man under her watch?

programme.desc: Totoy Bato explores the origins, the pathos of the character Totoy. All the different battle he went through (terrorist, revenge for his wife, corruption, prejudice and for love) defines him as a character.

programme.title: Bella Bandida ep 6
programme.desc: Loosely based on Francisco V. Coching's comic book of the same name, the story follows Bella, a medical doctor in her late 20's whose mission on life is to give back to her hometown, Santiago. Bella is in a relationship with Brick, the town councilor, and the nephew of the town mayor, Tigro.

programme.title: Taddy Taddy Po ep 10
programme.desc: A Sari-Sari Original Series. In this modern family, love wins. Alex is an up-and-coming reporter in a relationship with Marcus, a chef. One day, Alex's sister's kids show up at the couple's doorstep and the couple has no choice but to take care of the kids.

programme.title: Minsan Pa Natin Hagkan ang Nakaraan ep 8
programme.desc: A woman who was severely broken by her greatest love finds love again in an older man who did everything to put her back together. Just when she thought her life is finally back to normal, her greatest love comes back, determined to work for her forgiveness and win her backeven if it means breaking her family apart.

programme.title: Totoy Bato ep 23
programme.desc: Totoy Bato explores the origins, the pathos of the character Totoy. All the different battle he went through (terrorist, revenge for his wife, corruption, prejudice and for love) defines him as a character.

programme.title: Operation Break the Casanova's Heart ep 12
programme.desc: AfterStephen, the school'scasanova, breaks the heart ofNaomi'sbestfriend,Kryzel, Naomi becomes determined to seek revenge. In her effort to do so, she is discovered by the HSCC (Haters of Stephen Cruz Coalition), a secret group composed of Stephen's ex-girlfriends who seek revenge on Stephen and recruits her on their mission guided by 10 steps to break the casanova's heart.

programme.title: Sari Saring Sine: Kakampi Ko ang Diyos
programme.desc: Using a religious stature to defend himself, an ex-soldier and intelligence agent gets trapped in a conspiracy involving government and rebel forces.

programme.title: The Boy Foretold By The Stars
LIVE Ted Failon DJ Cha Cha Sa Radyo 5
LIVE Ted Failon DJ Cha Cha Sa Radyo 5
Lucas Abelardo
programme.desc: His sincerity and great dedication to his work is what distinguished police officer Lucas Abelardo from his other colleagues. But keeping to his principles while doing his job is not easy.

programme.title: Love at First Sight
programme.desc: Three childhood friends discover their worth and inner strengths, as they experience love and being loved.

programme.title: Bad Boy (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: This was the landmark film that launched Robin Padilla to stardom as one of the biggest action stars in the Philippine cinema. Robin played a young man branded as \"bad boy\" for life because as a kid he killed his father in defense of his mother.

programme.title: Pinagbiyak Na Bunga (Lookalayk)
programme.desc: Watching Andrew E and Chiquito together as they play the parts of con-men who might indeed be father and son.

programme.title: Working Girls (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: A humorous, but truly insightful look into the lives of women trying to make a living in the big city and coping with all the prejudice life bestowed on them because of their sex. This is also about their loves, their dreams, their weaknesses.

programme.title: Kahit Wala Ka Na
programme.desc: Love triangles will always be with us as long as romantic melodramas are made for the screen. The latest trio are Sharon Cuneta, Richard Gomez and TonTon Gutierrez. Sharon plays Irene, the wife torn between two men.

programme.title: Regalo
programme.desc: Tragedy had struck newlyweds, Daniel Fernando and Sheila Ysrael, when Daniel was paralyzed. Sheila was soon seduced by Dan Fernadez, a household help.

programme.title: Itanong Mo Sa Buwan
programme.desc: Josie is not really a victim but Angelito's lover. He then declares they planned the whole thing to finance a new life together. Who is telling the truth?

programme.title: Libingan Ng Mga Buhay
programme.desc: This is the true story of Rodolfo Fuentes who was unjustly sent to jail at the very young age of 14.

programme.title: Bakit May Kahapon Pa?
programme.desc: Award-winning actress Nora Aunor turned in one of her finest performances as Helen, a survivor.

programme.title: Pati Ba Pintig ng Puso? (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Eddie Garcia was at his best as the autocratic patriarch who ruled his family and all the people around him with an iron hand. But his grandson would have none of this.

programme.title: Cuadro De Jack
programme.desc: Young comedians Nino, Keempee, Dennis and Smokey starred in this 90's remake of a blockbuster hit. The Filipino version of the cowboy and Indians war made all the more appealing by the laugh-filled sequences featuring the inept, but trying hard bunch of heroes.

programme.title: Pieta 2
programme.desc: Rigor (Ace Vergel) dies but in Marta's fear that Noel (Bong Revilla Jr) might turn out like his amoral father, she raises her son with an iron hand.

programme.title: Ober Da Bakod 2 (Da Treasure Adbentyur)
programme.desc: The Dineros and the Dayukdoks, were off on a treasure hunt where they met the crazy professor Hannibal, a forgetful ghost, a tribe of midgets, a troop of sexy women from the moon and other fantasy figures.

programme.title: Uubusin Ko Ang Lahi Mo
programme.desc: The canonigos led by Mayor Placido (Eddie Gutierrez) have enjoyed sole political control of the town for sometime now. But their abusive reign is threatened when Fortunato Guerrero (Robert Arevalo) plans to enter the political arena in the coming elections. The Guerrero and Canonigo clans both vow to eliminate the each other.

programme.title: Si Maryo O Si Goko
programme.desc: Loony William Martinez stars as your COMPU-WHACKO THRILL-SEEKER who entered into a series of hell-raising misadventures that will take the viewers to the outskirts of computer-generated fantasia.

programme.title: Working Boys
programme.desc: The wacky trio of Tito, Vic \u0026 Joey became a quartet with the addition of Bagets star, Herbert Bautista. They played jacks-of-all-trades and masters of none in this take-off from the acclaimed Working Girls.

programme.title: Jessica Alfaro Story
programme.desc: One more look at the shocking Vizconde rape and murder case. This time, from the point of view of self-confessed star witness to the crime, the controversial Jessica Alfaro.

programme.title: Ikaw Lang
programme.desc: A librarian's husband turn out to be psychotically abusive. When the husband mistakenly thinks he has killed her, he dumps her in a river. In need of help to take revenge, she hooks up with a bank robber and together they kill him.

programme.title: Sambahin Mo Ang Katawan Ko
programme.desc: A mysterious girl descends on a fishing village and stirs up a storm by carrying on with two of the village's most coveted bachelors --- an engaged playboy and a rich seminarian.

programme.title: Kapag Wala Nang Batas
programme.desc: Gabriel (Chuck Perez) decides to enter the seminary to escape the violent world his family is involved with. But he soon realizes that he cannot totally breakout from his legacy.

programme.title: Aso't Pusa (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Pamboy (Tito Sotto) risked being beaten to a pulp by Osang's father each time he came to defend the girl. He tried to convince to leave, but Osang (Aiza Seguerra) continued to show her love for her father even after he went into jail.

programme.title: Macario Durano
programme.desc: When a corrupt police captain and his henchmen framed up Durano for a crime he did not commit. He then escaped from prison with revenge foremost in his mind.

programme.title: Sagad Hanggang Buto
programme.desc: When his parents are killed by assassins in the family car, Banjo is adopted by the thief who took his dead parents' wallet. Raised in poverty and used to surviving with his wits, he grows up as the town's resident hoodlum.
